title: HI as a guy i was wondering, where are all the league girls at?
body: id like to play with some women in this game but I seem to find an overwhelming variety of men.

replies.body:
There's a good amount of female players on League. Many of the people I play with are females, but their Summoner names don't make it blatantly obvious.  

I don't think gender is an important factor when it comes to gaming, or many other scenarios for that matter, (and I'm not just saying that because I'm a grill) - it's more about skill than anything else. 

Just my two cents.~

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=TsxMEfwI,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-07-07T17:10:46.256+0000)
>
> There's a good amount of female players on League. Many of the people I play with are females, but their Summoner names don't make it blatantly obvious.  
> 
> I don't think gender is an important factor when it comes to gaming, or many other scenarios for that matter, (and I'm not just saying that because I'm a grill) - it's more about skill than anything else. 
> 
> Just my two cents.~

Reminds me of the line: "there are no girls on the internet". Why care who they are in the real world? It's how they play the game that counts.
people who ask are creepers anyway
